CustomField.description: A rich text area field that stores an image of this person. The image must be a .gif, .jpg or .png file and is limited to 1 MB in size. For more information about images stored in rich text area fields, see Editing Rich Text Are Fields in Records (https://help.salesforce.com/articleView?id=fields_using_rich_text_area.htm&type=5).
CustomField.label: Image
